description: large bouquet of flowers in a cylindrical vase; hatched background
provenance: John E. Andrus III (Wayzata, Minn.); Julie Andrus (Minneapolis, Minn.)
signed: below image in pencil: Bernard Sanders | LLC in the plate: BS
text: At first glance, this print may seem like an abstract rectangle of gray, but closer inspection reveals a careful study of light and form. The dense cluster of blossoms rests in a cylindrical glass vase, partially filled with water. The artist heightens the brightness of the vase by setting it off with a cast shadow, while the flowers seem to illuminate the wall around them.
title: Floral Still Life
